output_list.criticism: The buyPreSaleTokens function has an integer overflow where 'tokens' is used as the argument for the 'mint' function, which can be zero, causing the integer overflow.
The buyPreSaleTokens function generates random numbers for the '_factor' argument, which can be used to arbitrarily increase the value of the tokens granted to the buyer.
The buyPreSaleTokens function requires the user to have permission to access the '_factor' argument, which can be misused to obtain unauthorized access to the preSale data.
